rcloneOperation.noVdisks: No vdisks set in config file.
rcloneOperation.deleteVdisk: Are you sure you want to delete ${name}? this action is irreversible!
rcloneOperation.createVdisk: Create a remote disk. If you don't understand the options here, please seek help.

firstLaunch.intro: Welcome to use Alist Helper, let's get started!
firstLaunch.about: Click here to learn more about Alist Helper!
firstLaunch.chooseTheme: First, let's choose your preferred theme here!
firstLaunch.chooseDirectory: Second, you have to get an alist and tell the Alist Helper where it is!
firstLaunch.autoInstall: AlistHelper now supports automatic installation of alist, try it out!
firstLaunch.getAlist: Want to use a specific version of alist or install it manually? Click here!
firstLaunch.finish: Finish! You can change these settings in settings!

saveWindowPlacement.title: Save window placement
saveWindowPlacement.description: This will allow Alist Helper save window placement.

minimizeToTray.title: Allow minimize to tray
minimizeToTray.description: This will allow Alist Helper to minimize to tray.

autoStart.title: Allow auto start
autoStart.description: This will allow Alist Helper auto start.

autoStartLaunchMinimized.title: Allow silent auto start
autoStartLaunchMinimized.description: This will allow Alist Helper auto start silently.

autoStartAlist.title: Allow alist auto start
autoStartAlist.description: This will auto start alist when Alist Helper starts.

autoStartLaunchMinimized.title: Allow silent auto start
autoStartLaunchMinimized.description: This will allow Alist Helper auto start silently.

workingDirectory.title: Working Directory
workingDirectory.hint: It's a Directory, not a File!

argumentsList.title: Arguments List
argumentsList.descriptionForRclone: Edit startup arguments for rclone. If you don't understand the options here, please seek help.

proxy.title: Http Proxy
proxy.hint: If left blank, it will not be enabled

rcloneSettings.title: Rclone Options
rcloneSettings.rcloneDirNotSet:
The rclone directory is not set. 
Please set the rclone directory and startup parameters in the settings.
(Experimental feature)

autoStartAlist.title: Allow rclone auto start
autoStartAlist.description: This will auto start rclone when Alist Helper starts.

startAfterAlist.title: Requires to start after alist starts
startAfterAlist.description: This will require rclone to start after alist starts.

upgrade.clickToCheck: Click the button next to check for updates
upgrade.canUpgrade: A new version is available, do you want to upgrade?
upgrade.noUpgrade: You are using the latest version.
upgrade.selectPackage: Select the update package you want to download.
upgrade.networkError: Loading... If it hasn't loaded for a long time, please check your network and try again.
